title: nukerboy
author: nukerboy
content: So let me explain what happened last night. I was playing blackjack at Pragmatic Play tables and twice the dealer did not give me cards but my money for the bet was taken. Luckily this happened to me before on another site and I decided to record the games. I proceeded than to contact support but I received no support, so I went to live support on Rollbit and told them about the situation.Here are pictures of the games where I was taken money but haven't dealt cards.https://i.imgur.com/FaycfEm.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/UmxGV6j.jpgAnd here is their response: They said I lost the rounds as I busted, but how could that happen when I was not dealt cards ?Also the hands they are showing are completely different.https://i.imgur.com/U8SwId8.pngI was patient with them but seems like they are not trying to help me get my money back so I'm opening this thread to let you know about my experience in their site.I will update here if they decide to give me back my money or keep scamming me.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Can you open the history (Pragmatic Play)Each bet has a history, and there always is information on how much money you are putting, in and losing, and what card/outcome you are getting. So, try to share the history bet as well on the pragmatic.

comments.author: nukerboy
comments.body: I know well, I play blackjack daily and like I said I had the similar issue in another big crypto casino but it was resolved really fast and I've got my money back. Here sadly its not the case..

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: This is quite complicated, the staff has a record of you losing the bet but you have a screenshot of not getting a card and lose the bet.  I believe this is a technical glitch but it is a question if whether Rollbit will accept your proof and give their time to investigate your case. From the answer of the chat support, they have the record of the bet losing so  I believe they will consider the case closed and you lose that bet.For additional document support, just like what @ryzaadit stated, why not share the bet history of those glitched bets?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP it is nice you brought this complaint to this platform for scrutiny but I think it would be better you move it to the appropriate board for further discussions. You can move it here. From what I could see and from your explanations, It could possibly be a glitch and I would suggest as others have done to asking you to give the casino time to carry out their investigation if possibly they as are on it, they would respond to you appropriately. I will implore you to exercise patience with them and do well to send them a reminder and if they Fail to respond then possibly a reputable member here could come into play to assist you. It would be nice you chat up their representative here as well to enquire from him or her about your complaints. I believe this could give you a little push to you gaining their attention.
